name: 2nd International Conference on Social Sciences and Humanities in the 21st Century
content: The 2nd International Conference on Social Sciences and Humanities in the 21st Century is coming to Berlin, Germany on the 09 – 11 of August 2024\. Featuring oral and poster presentations by the world’s leading academics, this event is meant to educate, inspire, and connect. Using the latest technologies and innovative formats, the conference will allow every attendee to engage in insightful discussions, learn from the diversity of experiences and perspectives, and discover new professional opportunities. As you are planning out your calendar for 2024, make sure to add ICSH21\. This is not an event you’d want to miss out on. The Organizing Committee will offer the participants a city tour of Berlin free of charge. All papers will have publication opportunities in the Conference Proceeding (with ISBN and a unique DOI number assigned to each paper) or in indexed international journals indexed with SCOPUS, DOAJ, EBSCO, GOOGLE SCHOLAR, COPERNICUS. The ICSH21 will be an in-person event and will also include live-stream Virtual sessions for those who cannot join physically but wish to learn and connect. In-person participants and speakers will get a Letter of Invitation after registration.
